description.narrative: The objective of the project is to promote industrial EE through adoption of ISO based energy management standards and system optimization approach for improvement of energy performance of industries to make its operations more reliable and competitive. The proposed project is designed to: i) increase the awareness and reinforce Thailand’s efforts on the implementation of energy management system based on ISO 50001 to urge industrial enterprises to integrate EE as part of the management cycle for the realization of continuous energy savings, and ii) incorporate industrial energy systems optimization as a mean to maximize energy savings and reduce production costs.
